title: What was Mr.Canady\'s name that owned Canady\'s Sporting Goods Store in Wilmington during the 1950-1960 era? I think the store might have been located on 2nd. and Market.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20031015/NEWS/210150369 By the way, the store is still open on Wrightsville Avenue.
